org.resthub.identity.controller

Class GroupController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.resthub.web.controller.GenericControllerImpl<Group,Long,GroupService>
      • org.resthub.identity.controller.GroupController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericController<Group,Long>

    @Named(value="groupController")
public class GroupController
extends GenericControllerImpl<Group,Long,GroupService>
    Front controller for Group Management
    Only ADMINS can access to this API
